00037 CellCacheScanner::CellCacheScanner(CellCachePtr &cellcache,
00038                                    ScanContextPtr &scan_ctx)
00039   : CellListScanner(scan_ctx), m_cell_cache_ptr(cellcache),
00040     m_cell_cache_mutex(cellcache->m_mutex), m_cur_value(0), m_eos(false) {
00041 
00042   {
00043     ScopedLock lock(m_cell_cache_mutex);
00044 
00045     m_start_iter =
00046         m_cell_cache_ptr->m_cell_map.lower_bound(scan_ctx->start_key);
00047     m_end_iter = m_cell_cache_ptr->m_cell_map.lower_bound(scan_ctx->end_key);
00048 
00049     m_cur_iter = m_start_iter;
00050 
00051     while (m_cur_iter != m_end_iter) {
00052       m_cur_key.load( (*m_cur_iter).first );
00053       if (m_cur_key.flag == FLAG_DELETE_ROW
00054           || m_scan_context_ptr->family_mask[m_cur_key.column_family_code]) {
00055         m_cur_value.ptr = m_cur_key.serial.ptr + (*m_cur_iter).second;
00056         return;
00057       }
00058       ++m_cur_iter;
00059     }
00060     m_eos = true;
00061     return;
00062   }
00063 
00064 }

00066 
00067 bool CellCacheScanner::get(Key &key, ByteString &value) {
00068   if (!m_eos) {
00069     key = m_cur_key;
00070     value = m_cur_value;
00071     return true;
00072   }
00073   return false;
00074 }

00078 void CellCacheScanner::forward() {
00079   ScopedLock lock(m_cell_cache_mutex);
00080 
00081   ++m_cur_iter;
00082   while (m_cur_iter != m_end_iter) {
00083 
00084     m_cur_key.load( (*m_cur_iter).first );
00085     if (m_cur_key.flag == FLAG_DELETE_ROW
00086         || m_scan_context_ptr->family_mask[m_cur_key.column_family_code]) {
00087       m_cur_value.ptr = m_cur_key.serial.ptr + (*m_cur_iter).second;
00088       return;
00089     }
00090     ++m_cur_iter;
00091   }
00092   m_eos = true;
